comment: Sweet medicinal nose, kiwi fruit. Custardy grain on the palate. Unique but enjoyable. Long finish.

Wow. IMHO, this is some of the best, most dynamic single malts I've had. It has depth, great mouth feel, layers of delicious flavor. After getting a 750, for $71, I had to take some time to know how much I liked this. A lot. I'm super impressed. I know this is vague, but this is easily a top pick for me.
